task_59.description: Stack the green tissue under the red cup
task_59.initial_setup: The green tissue is crumpled and lying flat on the left side of the table. The red cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A blue paper cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center.
task_59.final_state: The green tissue is flat and positioned directly under the red cup, which is now tilted slightly to accommodate it. The blue cup is upright on the far left corner.
